title: every game is a shutout!
body:
This is exactly like season 8. whether I win a game comes down to who has the biggest feeder or afk on their team. I can carry or I can suck. It doesn't matter. Winning and losing is just a coin toss of whether or not my team has the feeder. Its stupid. it makes trying to climb ranked an arduous task. It just doesn't even matter how I play.  Games don't feel evenly matched at all. Every game is a shutout. Riot you need to fix this. It makes your game awful to play. Your matchmaker has been garbage for years. People complain and complain. They post screen shots demonstrating mis-matched players. When will you address this? It's in the top 3 problems with this game.

I will say thanks for finally reducing some of the damage in the game with the last patch. I think there is a lot more to be done though.

replies.body:
1. toxicity
2. client crash, jungle changes, damage, mobility creep.

> [{quoted}](name=sphinxthelion7,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7Gcc13zX,comment-id=,timestamp=2019-01-26T18:26:03.704+0000)

Winning and losing is just a coin toss of whether or not my team has the feeder. Its stupid. it makes trying to climb ranked an arduous task. It just doesn&#039;t even matter how I play.  Games don&#039;t feel evenly matched at all. Every game is a shutout. Riot you need to fix this. It makes your game awful to play. Your matchmaker has been garbage for years. People complain and complain. They post screen shots demonstrating mis-matched players. When will you address this? It&#039;s in the top 3 problems with this game.
> 
> I will say thanks for finally reducing some of the damage in the game with the last patch. I think there is a lot more to be done though.

It all comes down to the problem of tracking individual skill in a 5v5 MOBA. It is complicated but I don't think impossible. I think it would help a ton with "toxic" banter... if good players get their ELO on the losing team they won't really care how bad their team was.

The cause of "toxicity" is when good players are forced into a loss by bad players, it has always been the case.
That's why they try to address with the new ranked. Which for some reason is EU is excluded

> [{quoted}](name=GripaAviara,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7Gcc13zX,comment-id=00070000,timestamp=2019-01-28T15:29:58.279+0000)
>
> That's why they try to address with the new ranked. Which for some reason is EU is excluded

wym How did they try to address it?

>  tracking individual skill

This is exactly what position ranks try to do
How so? It still won't account for teammate performance. Not to mention people swapping roles in pregame, there is no way that is going to work accurately...

You don't get it we don't speack about we geting tilted by feders or troler ...is not about that...is about team balance becase the guys who feed and over feed in the most of the times they make this because they must lane agains a oponent with greater elo than him...this thx to RIOT
I don't think someone wants to play rank to feed but if they get destroyed they will ...feed??

i need to thank riot for those changes.
it helped me reduce my play time from 4-6 hours a day to only 1-2 games a day untill i find a better game, then it'll be 0

etc...

By the time you get your fill the game will (hopefully) be good again.

Came here to check for this.  Found it.

Games are so one sided it's not even fun.  It's not even fun to win this hard and shit all over people so hard they FF immediately.  Game is just not fun to play in this state.

Doesn't it feel this way at the beginning of each season, though?

To be honest, I think it's like this a lot of the time anyway. I'm just not sure that it's more like that *now* than it was before.

Yeah and I stopped playing for almost all of season 8.
Honestly just quit. I've moved on to BFV. Realized how much I've missed FPS.

I actually did. I'm going to stop checking these boards too. I gave Riot all of preseason till now to address this. There are reports their profits have dropped in half. If the constant complaining and loss of over a billion in revenue isn't a wake up call to them, nothing is.

Word bro.

I fucking HATE this season the most so far. Everything's a fuckin stomp one way or another. Then there's the endless amounts of bull shit champs out there and not enough bans or ANY hint at a fix / nerf for those ridiculous abominations. Riot doesn't give a fuck, they just let shit go on and on and on then finally nerf some shit like -5 MS.

 I'm so glad Resident Evil 2 remake came out.

well.... u need to see it from another perspective.

Maybe he "feed" because his enemy is very good.
So in that case not the team with the feeder lose but the team with the skilled player win.

I mean, what you ask for is, that you want to be able carry games if you play good. But if you the one who dominate your lane means that you destroy your enemy.
So in that case you would say: "Yeah thats how i want it! Beeing able to carry again!"
But the enemy would say: "OMG we lose because we have the Feeder!"

Killing someone who keeps trying to 1v1 your fed ass because they googled lolcounters isn't skill

I've beaten countermatchups before, because I play my champ a ton, and still lose because my mid laner doesn't want to play safe and farms, he wants to get kills and "carry these garbage teams".

> [{quoted}](name=AngusBoomPants,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7Gcc13zX,comment-id=00080000,timestamp=2019-01-27T05:31:40.356+0000)
>
> Killing someone who keeps trying to 1v1 your fed ass because they googled lolcounters isn't skill
> 
> I've beaten countermatchups before, because I play my champ a ton, and still lose because my mid laner doesn't want to play safe and farms, he wants to get kills and "carry these garbage teams".

What counter play is there in a 1-2 shot meta? I had a Kayne pop out of a wall, immediately R which makes him un-targetable. When his R finished 1 was dead from it in 1 shot. There is no counter play to that. There isn't even a window to click on him. Granted he was fed, but that is obnoxious. Champs shouldn't be 1-shotting other champs. It just shouldn't be a thing. It never was in the past.

Counterpicks include Lissandra into Fizz, Darius into Malphite, and Urgot into Riven. 

Doesn't mean you'll win it

> [{quoted}](name=BigFBear,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=7Gcc13zX,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2019-01-27T02:15:38.000+0000)

It's because no one knows how to play safe. Especially bot lane

Or maybe it’s because you’re never safe because you still die in one rotation.

True.I think is worst than sez 8 i play mid and i feel i have no impact in these games even i'm 15 2 ....i have so manyyyyyy many games who all lanes are lost this is not even close to be balanced...is just a joke ....ex in my last 10 games i think i got ''ace'' in the most of the games but in 10 games bot always lose haaaard and feed top or jg same iisssssssssss just a joke this sez

I mean, unless you're 15/2 on a champ with 1-shot capacity like an assassin. Then you literally just run around offing them. But you have to be playing one of those 1-shot meta champs. The new champ sylus was 2 shotting me and my team. He was 7/7 with 55 farm and was very behind early game. Yet he has so much damage he didnt even need to farm. He got a ludens echo and suddenly could just off people in 2 hits.

They have a massive problem: damage too high for this kind of games.
They refuse to change it because in their vision it makes the game flashy and fast-paced and rewards reflex 
The snowball showdown is a direct consequence of the issue. They try to patch it with gold catch-up and rewards, which is bullshit and make the game even more chaotic.

My only problem is _that one asshole_ who won't surrender like the rest of the team wants. I don't care about feeders or losing if the game would just end already. I get kinda pissed when it just drags on and on. The enemy team almost always decides to play it safe anyway, so not like there's much of a shot at making a comeback.

Like we have never  heard this through all of season 8 and the game never got better. “It only early season they’ll fix it” nothing is fix “ don’t worry they’ll definitely fix it mid season” nothing happens “don’t worry they’ll take care of these things before worlds” nothing is fixed and worlds is nothing but abusing broken champs, items.

"I can carry or I can suck. It doesn't matter. Winning and losing is just a coin toss of whether or not my team has the feeder."
Wait... if you're the feeder, doesn't it mean it's your fault, and not matchmaker's? 
I mean, I don't think anyone is ever blameless/never has bad games.
